title: [Vision-Bug] Pool Party Taric's W
body:
Pool Party Taric's W(Bastion) ground animation blink if you stand near your ally that you mark with his W.
It only works with Taric's Pool Party Skin.
To reproduce the bug:
1.Go in a practice tool game with Pool Party Taric
2.Spawn an Allied Dummy 
3.Mark it with your W
4.Walk around it

I hope you fix the bug.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! This is something that we're aware of and have on our radar to fix! :)
The bug only occur when your targetted bastion move, if Taric move, the bug doesn't appear. It's really annoying and i hope it get fixed soon.
I've noticed this with Morgana's Black Shield as well. Well, at least i noticed it on Kog'Maw, haven't seen that happen on any other champions
Yea, this, combined with the weird passive sound effect, is probably why I never use this skin.
Also going to note that it is when either ally is moving, but at least one ally has to be moving.
